thread.section_title: The Roger - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BenchmarkME
title: Great boutique hotel
text: Boutique hotel in a good location. Comfortable room and very high standards of housekeeping, with pleasant staff. No tea or coffee facilities in room, but coffee available in lobby in the morning from 5:30am daily. Wide variety of snacks available in room, but very expensive to buy. Bar and restaurant on site, but very expensive.
